attributes.action: Ban councils from stopping neighbouring residents from using recycling centres
attributes.additional_details: Example.  Sandhurst residents now must take a 16 mile round trip to Longshot Lane instead of 6 mile round trip to Frimley Road.
attributes.background: Councils have started issuing permits to use recycling facilities.  Thus residents cannot always now use the closest facility, increasing their journey length causing more pollution and discouraging them from recycling.
